accessingBitOfParameterAsNotSimplifiedEx.circuit: module main(inout b(16)) for $i = 0 to 5 step 1 do b.(2 + ($i + 5)) += 1 rof

accessingBitRangeOfParameterAsNotSimplif.circuit: module main(inout b(16)) for $i = 0 to 5 step 1 do b.0:(2 + ($i + 5)) += 1 rof

accessingSingleDimensionOfParameterAsNot.circuit: module main(inout b[2](16)) for $i = 0 to 5 step 1 do b[(2 + ($i + 5))] += 1 rof

accessingNestedDimensionOfParameterAsNot.circuit: module main(inout b[2][4][5](16)) for $i = 0 to 5 step 1 do b[1][(2 + ($i + 5))][2] += 1 rof

accessingBitOfLocalAsNotSimplifiedExpres.circuit: module main() wire c(16) for $i = 0 to 5 step 1 do c.(2 + ($i + 5)) += 1 rof

accessingBitRangeOfLocalAsNotSimplifiedE.circuit: module main() wire c(16) for $i = 0 to 5 step 1 do c.0:(2 + ($i + 5)) += 1 rof

accessingSingleDimensionOfLocalAsNotSimp.circuit: module main() wire c[2](16) for $i = 0 to 5 step 1 do c[(2 + ($i + 5))] += 1 rof

accessingNestedDimensionOfLocalAsNotSimp.circuit: module main() wire c[2][4][5](16) for $i = 0 to 5 step 1 do c[1][(2 + ($i + 5))][2] += 1 rof
